revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=Meraki MR24 |revision=(600-14010) |upc=810979011019 |asin=B0064D5WVE |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |fcc_date=03/28/2011 |fcc_id=UDX-60014010 |ic_id=6961A-60014010 |type=access point, mesh node |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Applied Micro |cpu1_model=APM82181 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} {{TagLine|Cisco Networks Meraki MR24 Cloud Managed AP}} :[http://meraki.com/products/wireless/mr24 Product page]
The SoC used is from ''[[Applied Micro]]'' (Cisco 1142 AP) :An ''[[IDT]]'' PCIe packet switch is used to provide the usage of :multiple PCIe devices on the single host IF provided by the SoC.
A C2PC made 07/01/2013 specifies... *The original wireless modules use AR9380 (2.4GHz) and AR9390 (5GHz). *These modules will be replaced with ones using AR9381 (2.4GHz) and AR9380 (5GHz).
The two minipcie ports are non-standard as only the supplied Wi-Fi cards will work in them.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.insearchoftech.com/2012/03/25/inside-wireless-hardware-part-1/ ''Inside Wireless Hardware'' on '''InSearchofTech'''] :[[Cisco Meraki MR24]]
